trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event occurs whenever a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is added or removed from a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>esemény akkor következik be, amikor egy <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>van hozzáadva, vagy nem távolítható el egy <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the added strokes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a hozzáadott Strokes elemek.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the removed strokes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a eltávolított Strokes elemek.

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that have been added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a vonások lettek hozzáadva a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the added strokes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a hozzáadott Strokes elemek.

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that have been removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a Strokes elemek, amelyek el lettek távolítva a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the removed strokes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a eltávolított Strokes elemek.
